title: Create a Manual Promotion
description: A store manager decides to create a one-day 'manager's special' on a specific item to clear out slow-moving stock.

tasks.description: Open the promotions module in the store management system.
tasks.expected_outcome: The manager accesses the promotion creation tool.

tasks.description: Create a new promotion, define it as a percentage discount (e.g., 30% off), and link it to the specific item number.
tasks.expected_outcome: The promotion details are entered correctly.

tasks.description: Set the promotion to be active for today only and activate it.
tasks.expected_outcome: The temporary promotion is now live in the POS system.
